containsHeader.description: Whether the file has a header row, or the files each have a header row.

delimiter.description: Delimiter between values in the file.

format.description: File format. Valid values are `CSV`, `TSV`, `CLF`, `ELF`, `XLSX`, and `JSON`.

startFromRow.description: A row number to start reading data from.

textQualifier.description: Text qualifier. Valid values are `DOUBLE_QUOTE` and `SINGLE_QUOTE`.
